pain_points.description: The website occasionally fails to complete the sign-up process.
supporting_quotes: It just wouldn't complete. Like when I was signing up for something, it didn't.
So then I just gave up and came back later.
pain_points.current_workarounds: User gives up and attempts to sign up later.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Causes frustration and delays in signing up for events.

pain_points.description: Difficulty in navigating the app due to lack of clarity on whether it needs to be downloaded.
supporting_quotes: I don't think I've downloaded the app.
Do you have to download the app to use it?
pain_points.current_workarounds: User attempts to access the website instead of the app.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Leads to uncertainty and potential missed opportunities to use the app features.

pain_points.description: Limited understanding of the directory functionality.
supporting_quotes: I go to the directory to look people up.
pain_points.current_workarounds: User manually searches for information instead of relying on directory.
pain_points.impact_on_user: Potentially inefficient use of time when trying to find information about event attendees.
